00064 
00087 class EGS_CIRCLE_EXPORT EGS_CircleShape : public EGS_SurfaceShape {
00088 
00089 public:
00090 
00093     EGS_CircleShape(EGS_Float Xo, EGS_Float Yo, EGS_Float R, EGS_Float R_i = 0,
00094                     const string &Name="",EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00095         EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f), xo(Xo), yo(Yo), ro(R_i), dr(R-R_i) {
00096         otype = "circle";
00097         if (dr < 0) {
00098             ro = R;
00099             dr = R_i - R;
00100         }
00101         A = M_PI*dr*(dr + 2*ro);
00102     };
00103     ~EGS_CircleShape() {};
00104     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00105         EGS_Float r = ro + dr*sqrt(rndm->getUniform());
00106         EGS_Float cphi, sphi;
00107         rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00108         return EGS_Vector(xo + r*cphi, yo + r*sphi, 0);
00109     };
00110 
00111 protected:
00112 
00113     EGS_Float xo, yo, ro, dr;
00114 };
00115 
00116 #endif
